message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% before inflation eats away at your share.
I think 60-40 is a better split, considering I'm the one losing value each round.
Bob, my offer is still the best you'll get.  The longer this goes on, the less your share is actually worth.  Take the deal!
I'd rather take a bigger share now, even with inflation, than settle for less.
